Text: Thank you very very much for this...

I noticed some of the KTMA movies played later in the series(e.g. the movies with Gamera.) Do they include the same soundtrack, like, are they just sort of "re-runs", or do they include entirely new commentaries?

I'm guessing some of you guys know some about this and I'd be very happy if you could give me an answer.

Excuse me, I'm a noob in this area.
The later episodes were largely, if not completely, redone. The KTMA episodes do have one advantage, in that the movies that were repeated are usually more complete in the KTMA version.

Thankyouthankyouthankyouthankyouthankyou...

I used to have most of the shows (most of them taped from Comedy Central), but those got left behind when I moved overseas a few years ago... This is superb, especially because I'd never seen some of the first season or any of the KTMA shows... I am making a point to share all of these torrents at a minimum of 2:1 and hope others will do likewise.
